name: Keybase
description: Get a public key, safely, starting just with someone's social media username
summary: Keybase help make using keys more secure and understandable by providing what's known as public key infrastructure (PKI) for cryptography.
features: Associate public key to social profile
scenario: When I want to associate my public key to my social profile
When I want to find out a public key of someone I want to send an encrypted message to
